page.title: 13POPULATION
page.content: The population of the Newton Abbot area seems to be increasing, if the new housing estates are anything to go by. Many people, it seems, come to the area from other parts of the country in order to give themselves and their families a{'better way of life'.}The native Devonshire folk seem to get less and less. Some people believe that a greater proportion of the population are{older {people}who have retired to Devon. This, together with{young people moving away to find suitable jobs, might mean a population that is getting older. The population seems to change a lot, as people move out and new people move in.
